title: Surface Studio 2 first look
description: Microsoft has officially unveiled the Surface Studio 2. It looks very similar on the outside, with a 28-inch display at 3:2 aspect ratio and the classic Studio hinge that lets this giant all-in-one PC convert into a drawing mode. We got an early look at the Surface Studio 2 at Microsofts press event in New York City, and its good to see Microsoft has largely focused on the internals with this refresh.
